alert.note: Alert for Catawba (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Catawba County through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickory, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickory, Newton, St. Stephens, Conover, Longview, Claremont, Mountain View, Lake Hickory, Lookout Shoals Lake and Startown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
